mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A AGENT_DOC_PK) */ SEQ, DOC_FILE, REG_ADMIN, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_ADMIN_INFO('ADMIN_NAME', REG_ADMIN) REG_ADMIN_NM, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DT FROM ${db.mainschema}.AGENT_DOC A WHERE USABLE = 'U' AND AGENT_ID = #{agent_id}
SELECT SEQ, DOC_FILE FROM ${db.mainschema}.AGENT_DOC A WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND USABLE = 'U'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ${db.mainschema}.AGENT_DOC WHERE DOC_FILE = #{doc_file} AND USABLE = 'U'
